briefTitle: Exercise Intervention in Women With Metastatic Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Pilot Study of a Moderate-Intensity Exercise Intervention in Women With Metastatic Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: To determine the impact of a 16 week exercise intervention on physical functioning and cardiorespiratory fitness in a group of patients with metastatic breast cancer.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Metastatic or locally advanced breast cancer not amenable to curative surgery
* Life expectance of greater than 12 months
* English speaking
* Pre- and postmenopausal
* Performance status 0-1

Exclusion Criteria:

* Baseline exercise of more than 150 minutes/week
* Active brain metastases
* Uncontrolled cardiac disease
